version.releaseNotes: This release adds support for the new Gui2 theming in Harmoni and used by Segue 2. Also added are a number of new Wizard components and improvements.
version.new: AbstractActions: New ConditionalGet action enables browser-caching of content.
Gui2: New actions for accessing Gui2 theme images and CSS.
version.change: Gui/Gui2: The EMPHASIZED_BLOCK has be deprecated and a SIDEBAR_BLOCK added to enable better syntactical alignment between usage and theme definition.
Repository: View-File and View-Thumbnail now support browser-caching via conditional-GET.
ResultPrinter: Added a class name to enable CSS styling and changed the block type for page links to UnstyledBlock from Background_Block.
Wizard: FileUploadField now validates MIME types when they are specified.
version.fix: Wizard: Error text now doesn't take up space when not shown.
Wizard: Text-Areas now have id attributes set, enabling error checking rules to work.
version.new: Wizard: New Wizard Components for text areas and fields with HTML cleaning.

Wizard: WRadioListWithDelete Wizard component added.
This component is needed to enable the deletion of user-created themes.

Wizard: Text-Areas can now have a wrap attribute set to control text-wrapping.
This does not result in valid XHTML, but is the only known way to control wrapping in a text-area.
Wizard: New XML Schema validator rule for wizard.

version.releaseNotes: This release add a few minor changes to tagging actions.
version.new: Harmoni_Db: Test scripts for Harmoni_Db in main/modules/harmon_db/
version.change: Tagging: Changes to the tag-printing methods to add support for read-only tag clouds.
Tagging: Tagger Javascript window can now take a variable 'view tags' action.
Javascript: Harmoni.quickURL() now will be set-up properly even if a namespace is set when it is called.

version.releaseNotes: This release adds a minor change needed by Segue 2 - beta 18.
version.change: ResultPrinter: Now can access the number of results printed.

version.releaseNotes: This release adds a few javascript functions.
version.new: Javascript: New common functions for printing file-size strings from integers.

version.releaseNotes: This release fixes a minor syntax error in the wizard.
version.fix: Wizard: Fixed XHTML validation errors in the RadioMatrix wizard component.
RepositoryImporter: Previous fixes to tab-delimited importing broke single-asset importing. Now both are working.
Abstract Actions: Fixed setCommentsLink validation in RSSAction class.
version.change: SQL: All column names are now lowercase.

version.releaseNotes: This release fixes a number of bugs, particularly with respect to cross-browser compatibility and Repository Importer issues.
version.fix: Help: Now doesn't strip HTML tags from the children of div elements.

Wizard: Since internet explorer doesn't like <input type='button'> elements and we need to use <button> elements, this screws up firefox's submit-on-enter behavior. We need to add an onKeyDown event handler to force the search button to be triggered when enter (ASCII 13) is pressed in the search field.
Temporary directory locations are now configurable in the RepositoryExporter.
RepositoryExporter now works with Harmoni 1.0.
RepositoryImporter: Tab delimited importing now works again. Was previously not prepending the source directory to the file name and not properly locating files.
RepositoryIO: File downloads now work in IE6. Cache-control problems with IE's multiple-request download process where causing IE to delete its download.

version.releaseNotes: This release adds the ability of the Rich-Text editor in the wizard to accept custom configuration options.
version.fix: Wizard: Rich-Text editor (FCKEditor) now can have configuration options set.
AbstractActions: Fixed Runtime notice in RSSAction.

version.releaseNotes: This release includes a few minor improvements and has been updated to work with Harmoni 1.0.0.
version.change: Help system now uses PHP5 DOM rather than the DOMIT libraries needed under PHP 4.
AbstractActions: XML action can now take an error type parameter.
Repository I/O: Viewing of files and thumbnails now returns a 'File not found' GIF instead of leaving uncaught exceptions.
Wizard: FCK Editor now named 'Rich-Text' in the UI.
Wizard: The HtmlTextArea now allows for prepending or appending HTML markup.
version.new: Wizard: New RequiredStepWizard will not allow saving until certain steps have been visited.

version.releaseNotes: This release fixes a few minor bugs.
version.change: UI2: Upgraded Scriptaculous library to latest version.
version.fix: Logout now directs properly.
Language: Now doesn't throw an exception when changing the language.
version.new: Javascript: Inclusion of the brwsniff.js browser sniffer library.

version.releaseNotes: This release fixes a few minor bugs and adds a new Wizard component.
version.new: Wizard: New SearchList component that allows the user to build a list of items over the course of several searches with one or more search terms.
Help: New Help class with static methods for generating help links.
version.fix: Fixed a few errors in the Agent editing UI.
Wizard: Fixed tabbing in the HierarchicalRowMatrix.

version.releaseNotes: This release fixes a number of wizard issues.
version.change: AbstractActions: WizardAction now retrieves the return URL before destroying the wizard object. This allows data submitted in the Wizard to be used for determining the return URL.
Wizard: Moved EventListeners to their own directory.
Wizard: EventButton class hierarchy has been cleaned up a bit to allow support for a button press to trigger multiple events.
Wizard: Added SingleStepWizard::withText() and WCancelButton::withLabel() methods to enable customization by actions who use them.
version.new: Wizard: New HierarchicalRadioMatrix component provides a hierarchically-dependent list of options.
Wizard: New WSearchField component.

version.releaseNotes: This release fixes a few bugs and adds a new Wizard component.
version.fix: HierarchyPrinter: Now uses the call_user_func_array() function rather that eval() to better support object methods.
version.new: Wizard: New RadioMatrix components provide a list of dependent options.
version.fix: AdminTools: Group-membership UIs now work with LDAP groups. Needed to fix the way Ids were being passed through to the processing scripts.

version.releaseNotes: This release includes some minor bug fixes and cleanup.
version.fix: AdminTools: Browse AZ user interface now uses proper callback functions.
Logging: Now exceptions are caught if the node specified no longer exists.
version.change: Removed unused ui2/addplugin action.

version.releaseNotes: This release fixes issues with log browsing, admin tools, and tags.
version.fix: ResultPrinter: The TableResultPrinter was dropping into a long loop and preventing fast viewing of logs.
AdminTools: Group membership UI now loads.
Tags: Now doesn't print a link to "your tags" if no one is logged in.
Importer: ExifRepositoryImporter now uses the filename as the default title if one is not present in the metadata.

version.releaseNotes:
This release fixes a number of bugs and reworks many of the class hierarchies to use PHP 5 interfaces and abstract classes for better enforcement of class responsibilities.
The Action class hierarchy has changed to use abstract classes and interfaces. Any applications that extend the Action class will need to be checked to ensure that they implement all abstract methods.
version.important: Actions: The Action class hierarchy has changed to use abstract classes and interfaces. Any applications that extend the Action class will need to be checked to ensure that they implement all abstract methods.
version.fix: CreateAgent, now doesn't die when encountering the change-user authentication type.
version.new: RepositoryIO: Now supports records types with only string values.
version.change: RepositoryIO: updating to PHP 5 interfaces.
version.fix: Fixing a number of E_STRICT notices and improving the class and interface hierarchies.
version.change: Wizard: Asset component now expects UnknownIdExceptions rather than FALSE when an asset does not exist.
version.fix: Wizard step links are now working in name-spaced wizards.
Wizard links now do not bypass PHP field validation.
version.change: Printers can now accept instance-method callbacks of the form array($obj, 'methodname').
version.fix: GroupPrinter and HierarchyPrinter now use call_user_func_array() for executing callback methods instead of eval().
version.change: CreateUser action now forwards to the agent details screen.
CenteredPanel: center() now extends the screen.
FileBrowser: Now name-spacing the assetId parameter.

version.fix: Javascript: document.getHeight() method now reliably returns the height of the document whether the window is larger or smaller than the height.
Importer: Fixing importer SQL to work with PostgreSQL.
RepositoryIO: Setting auto-increment column to work with PostgreSQL.

version.new: Wizard: Adding the HtmlTextArea component for switching between multiple text editors, some WYSIWYG, some not.
version.change: Wizard: Now defines classes and methods to enforce interface compliance.
version.new: Javascript: Now provides functions for name-spacing of form fields.
Wizard: Added new wizard component, 'SaveWithChoiceButtonList'.
Wizard: Adding a single-step wizard for small wizards.
Wizard: Can now access the save and cancel buttons, allowing for changing of labels.
Wizard: Adding an optional 'extendedHtml' parameter to allow radio buttons to have additional HTML attached after the label.
Wizard: Now supports [[fieldname:xxxxxxx]] syntax to allow locating of input elements by custom javascript.
Wizard: Wizard steps can now return their raw content/markup, allowing appending and prepending of additional content/markup.
version.fix: Converting all short tags (<?) to the full tags (<?php) for compatibility with more PHP configurations.
Fixed a few bugs that prevented the basket from running in PHP 5.

version.change: Wizards: Now steps can be accessed out-of-order via links.
Importing: Can now import Assets directly under another Asset rather than just at the Repository root.
Importing: Can now import a single file as an Asset, without compression.
version.new: Wizard: Select field can now have a disabled option added.
AuthN: Added support for LDAP Group searching.
Repository: Added support for files stored at remote locations.
version.fix: Exporting: Temporary files are now removed after they are used.
version.new: Exporting: Now shows status of the export.
version.fix: Importing: Now doesn't add the AssetContent structure to the Repository's list.
version.change: Importing: Importing now works on all files in an import archive, regardless of any directories/subdirectories in the archive.
version.new: Importing: Exif importing method now has a default Dublin Core / VRA Core schema, so collections that use Dublin Core/VRA Core will not need to include a schema.xml file when importing images.
version.fix: Tagging: Tags could be accidentally added with no value, no cannot.
Tagging: Adding a tag before current tags load was causing an error.
Tagging: User tags are now loaded from the cache so that they appear first and don't wait for being reloaded.
Tagging: Adding and removing tags from the cache now keeps cache more properly up to date.
version.new: Tagging: Now can fetch related tags.
version.fix: Thumbnails: Can now determine if a thumbnail is real or an icon.
version.change: AuthZ: Now orders Authorization display in popup with everyone and institute at the top, then groups, then agents, ordered alphabetically within each category.
version.fix: Logs: Now prints the node id if there is no display name.
version.change: Logs: Now prints links back to the logs for agents and nodes in the RSS Feed.

version.important: Polyphony 0.7.0 is a merging of Polyphony 0.6.9 with work done on the Polyphony trunk by Tim and John over the summer. The additions on the trunk include implementations of the CourseManagement and Scheduling OSIDs as well as some GUI-theme-management work.
version.fix: Install: Fixed warnings in partstructure install.
version.new: GUI theme management interfaces.
Wizard: new logic wizard and components to support theme management.
version.change: AgentEditing: Updates to interface for agent editing.
version.new: CourseManagement: Interfaces for managing courses and membership.

version.fix: Tagging: Fixed IE javascript errors.
version.new: AuthZ: Added icon and popup display of Authorizations
version.change: Moved all polyphony javascript into the centrally-loaded place.
Refactored javascript classes and created a general purpose Panel class for use with pop-up content.

version.fix: ResultPrinter: Now doesn't overrun the end of the array when authorizations are checked.
version.new: Tagging: Support for Tagging.
Help: Adding action to allow viewing of exif data in images.
Javascript: Added a common Javascript library.
version.fix: Importing: Updating the Exif importer to support multi-valued fields such as keywords.
Wizard: Now can handle cache names that contain periods.
version.change: Icons have now been moved to their own directory for easier access when keeping polyphony installed in a non-web-accessible directory.

version.fix: RSS/Logs: Fixed log RSS feed links when no priority is explicitly chosen.
Repository: Now returns false instead of throwing an error if the Asset with the specified id does not exist.
Now can force cookie usage to prevent accidental or intentional session hijacking by the passing of session ids in the url.
version.new: New abstract action for RSS feeds. Handles some input validation, formatting, and authentication.
Logs: Added RSS feeds of logs.
version.fix: Logs: Now has a button to clear date limits.
Removed unneeded parameter from file and thumbnail urls.
version.change: File/Thumbnail view: Now forces HTTP authentication for thumbnails if the user is not authenticated.

version.fix: Importer: Now doesn't generate null thumbnails for multi-page PDF files.
Basket: Can now view basket contents in viewer.
PrimitiveIO: Now doesn't die when users enter data that cannot be made into a valid value object.
Wizard/PrimitiveIO: Now doesn't show the 'new' field for SelectOrNew components when displaying the starting-text.
Importer: Now ignores and doesn't import files beginning with periods, which are usually hidden files.
Importer: Fixed default types.
version.new: Importer: Adding the Files-Only repository importer to allow the importing of files with no metadata.
version.fix: Importer: Fixed a parse error.
version.new: Wizard: Adding new WComponentCollection class that can wrap other components.
version.fix: FileDownloading: Now adds filenames appropriately or 'Untitled' even if the file doesn't have a name.

version.change: Basket/Selection images are now show bordered placeholders before they are loaded.
Basket/Selection images are now resized -- albeit only one dimension -- in IE.
ResultPrinter: Now uses skipNext() and count() methods when iterating if all items are authorized to print.
StatusStars: Moved output buffer jumping methods to the RequestContext as ob_jump() and ob_land() from Chris's StatusStars. StatusStars is now in harmoni/core/utilities.
StatusStars: Now will print a label if requested.
DataManagerGUI: AuthoritativeValues addition is now an AuthorizationFunction.
Wizard: Can now call setEnabled() on RepeatableComponentCollections and have the intended effect.
Wizard: Can now change Add/Remove button labels for Repeatable Components.
Wizard: Verified change inputs are now set to be checked for new values by default.
Wizard: onchange items are now added with addOnChange() rather than overwritten with setOnchange(). Same with setOnClick() going to addOnClick().
version.new: Wizard: Added an addConfirm() method to EventButtons and Selects to allow prompting for user-confirmation.
version.fix: Wizard: Now Select or new fields show either the option OR new, not both.
WizardAction: now getWizard() will have the same cachename translation as was in the runWizard() method.
version.change: Help: Improving the parsing and display of help files to support relative links to images, style sheets, and other files. Better generation of menus too.
version.fix: Logging: Ensured that logging is now ready for use before attempting to log errors.

version.change: ResultPrinter pagination now matches background styles.
Edit-authorization screen now limits each level of the hierarchy to ten nodes to prevent being overwhelmed (and timing out) if there are many child nodes.
Selection view now better matches the collection view.
Basket/Selection now has an empty link.
All importers log their actions and errors appropriately.

version.new: RepositoryInOutModules: Now provides for displaying thumbnails for particular file Records.
version.change: Wizard: now supports drop-down-menu reordering rather than just move-up/move-down.
Repository Search Modules now support forced setting of values from from a session cache.
"Basket" is now being displayed as "Selection"
Result printers now pull more from the common abstract class.
Reworked the basket library be more straight-forward, getting rid of the unneeded "BasketManager" and putting all of the functionality in the "Basket" singleton.
Made the Add-Asset-To-Basket process work via AJAX rather than reloading the page.
version.new: Added the WSelectOrNew class to provide an interface element in which a choice could be made or new value could be added.
version.change: Importer class now uses StatusStars to keep track of progress and keep user informed
version.new: StatusStars class added, is a very simple asterisk status bar, created for the importer, but works anywhere. (direct output so no apache related timeouts)
Now caches resized versions of images.

version.fix: Fixed return by reference errors that threw notices in PHP 4.4
Fixed url '.' to '_' conversion errors.

version.change: Agents & Authorizations: Added, edited, and reworked aspects of editing and lookup for faster cleaner and more sensible interfacing.
Login: modified the login process so that it is more consistent and understandable.
Result Printers: now capable of configurable display.
Printers: all links and other clickable things do what should be expected of clicking on them.
Validator: fixed rules and moved some validations
version.new: Created help files for importing and exporting, along with examples and dtds for the different types of importers. They are available on sf.net in the appropriate locations.
HelpBrowser system.
Added Wizard components to support repeatable values as well as 'confirmed-change' linked checkboxes and fields. Modified I/O modules to function with system.
version.change: Modified the implementation of the repeatable wizard components so that everything is elegant and makes more sense, generally more usable.
Now using GUI Block level constants such as EMPHAZISED_BLOCK instead of 'Block 3'.
Optimizations to speed loading of thumbnails.
Basket & Exporter: Together at last, exporting assets from anywhere in the system by adding them to the basket and exporting the basket.
version.new: Basket: New functionality for clearing the basket, adding multiple and single files to the basket.
Exporter: XML Exporter is designed to function with XML Importer and allows for human readable (XML) backups of the repository system. It is also readily extensible to other aspects of our system.
Importer: XML Importer is capable of populating repositories with flexibility, and is readily extended to work with groups and authorizations, or any other aspects of our system.
version.change: Importer: XML importer has been removed from the "RepositoryImporter" classification, and re-designed to be extensible to all aspects of our systems. Tab and Exif are still only available for repository data population.

version.new: Repository OutputModules now support accessing the first image record of an asset as well as a thumbnail.
Importers: Abstract, XML, Tab-Delimited, and EXIF fully functioning. Batch importing of assets now available.
Importers: Abstract, XML, Tab-Delimited, and EXIF fully functioning. Batch importing of assets now available.
New "Basket" system for collecting [Asset] Ids during the session. The Basket allows for easy user-selection of a large number of items.
version.change: Changed the StartupCheck classes to use the new Wizard.
Changed actions to use Everyone and Users group IDs of "edu.middlebury.agents.everyone" and "edu.middlebury.agents.users".
version.fix: Wizard now can handle field names with .'s in them.
RepositoryInputOutputModules now check for the right record interface.
version.change: New Wizard system based on nested components. Much more extensible and easy-to-use than the old system.
Updating much of Polyphony to support the RequestContext
version.new: Added an abstract Action class-hierarchy to enable the easy creation of class-based actions.

version.fix: clone() is a reserved word in PHP5. All clone methods have been renamed replicate().
textdomain() calls now specify NULL instead of no argument to prevent PHP Warnings.
RepositoryInOutModules now don't throw errors.
version.important: Polyphony now runs on PHP5 and on Win32 systems in addition to PHP4.3 and POSIX systems.

version.change: Authentication now plays nicely with GET parameters and maintains them around during the authentication sequence.
Fixed some references to the non-existent "SharedManager"
Reconfigured modules to work with version 2 of the OSIDs.
Authentication now fully uses Harmoni's implementation of the AuthN OSID as Harmoni's own Authentication/LoginHandlers have been removed.
version.new: Graphical tools have been created for managing hierarchical authorizations.
The 'dr' module provides actions for displaying images and thumbnails from a Digital Repository, making use of the DRInputOutputModules.
DRInputOutputModules provide common functions for displaying and editing DigitalRepository records.
The 'auth' module provides shared actions for logging in and out.
StartupCheck and ConfigSystem: These should allow easy creation of browser-based install/configuration options and setup. They are undocumented and untested.
Languages: Shared actions for generating a "switch language" form, as well as the logic for performing that switch.

The Wizard library provides a system for the generation of dynamic Multi-step wizards. The Wizard library handles the catching, storing, and validating of form submissions, as well as handle user-progress through the wizard.
Created Polyphony directory structure.
